content: Sportsbet.io Super Bowl 57: Prop PartySunday, February 12 @ 6:30 PM (EST)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/event/american-football/usa/nfl/philadelphia-eagles-v-kansas-city-chiefs-63d735cbde92f702f25fb456There are 25 prop bets that you must select the winner For each prop bet you select correctly, you will earn 1 point1st place:  5 mbtc Free Bet2nd place:  4 mbtc Free Bet 3rd place:  3 mbtc Free Bet 4th place:  2 mbtc Free Bet5th place:  1 mbtc Free BetThe 25 Prop Bets1.  Team to win Super Bowl 57?  KC or PHI (must get correct to proceed)2.  U.S. National Anthem 125 seconds? Over or Under3.  Coin toss?  Heads or Tails 4.  Team to win the coin toss?  KC or PHI5.  Will the opening kickoff be a touchback?  Yes or No6.  Will PHI cover the -1.5 point spread?  Yes or No7.  Total 50.5?  Over or Under8.  Patrick Mahomes to throw an interception?  Yes or No9.  Patrick Mahomes to complete 291.5 passing yards?  Over or Under10.  Jalen Hurts to throw an interception?  Yes or No11.  Jalen Hurts to complete 245.5 passing yards?  Over or Under12.  Highest scoring quarter?  1,2,3,4 or even 13.  Will there be a defensive or special teams touchdown scored?  Yes or No14.  What will happen first?  Touchdown or Sack15.  What will the longest score be?  Touchdown or Field Goal 16.  Total Field Goals made 3.5?  Over or Under  17.  Travis Kelce receiving yards 78.5?  Over or Under18.  Isiah Pacheco rushing yards 49.5?  Over or Under 19.  A.J. Brown receiving yards 72.5?  Over or Under 20.  Jalen Hurts rushing yards 48.5?  Over or Under 21.  Team to score first?  KC or PHI 22.  Team to score last?  KC or PHI23.  Most penalty yards?  KC or PHI24.  Most first downs?  KC or PHI25.  What color Gatorade will be showered onto the winning coach?  Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Clear, Red or Purple?Tiebreaker: Total combined points scored?Example1.  PHI2.  Over3.  Heads 4.  KC 5.  Yes 6.  Yes 7.  Under8.  Yes9.  Under10.  No11.  Over12.  113.  Yes14.  Sack15.  Field Goal16.  Over17.  Over18.  Under19.  Under 20.  Over21.  PHI22.  KC23.  KC24.  PHI25.  BlueTiebreaker: 45 points(Small print)* Must be active in Gambling and/or Gambling discussion or have an active account with SB *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **
